title: how to fix Unspecified error occurred
body: Please help me i donwoad League and when i start the gme to update he stay on 0% and then the Error -- Unspecified error occurred.Please check the logs for more information. Please help me guys

replies.body: If that patcher is sitting at 0% and never moves, it's pretty likely due to League not having all of the admin rights it needs to be able to scan the game files for updates. Run through this guide on setting up your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know how that helps!
